== Small Farm ==

[[File:Village_Farm.png|thumb|Small Farm (Plains, Old)]]

All of these small farms are the same except that the taiga variant has spruce wood, the savanna variant has acacia wood, the plains variant has oak wood, and the desert variant has sandstone.
